doc.title: Phone!
doc.plot: A visual composition, constructed and performed live by Mr. Paul Marchand, during a performance by composer, Dan Graziani and his orchestra. Voyeuristic images and sounds are inspired the by the anxiety of daily life and modern communication, and lead the viewer through a downtown Los Angeles cityscape, which is on the brink of change. The performance was recorded and screened at the Arclight Cinemas Hollywood as part of the Spirit of Silver Lake Artist Award in the Silver Lake Film Festival
